com.xatkit.plugins.giphy.platform.action

Class GetGif

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RuntimeAction<T>
      • com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RestAction<T>
        • com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RestGetAction<GiphyPlatform>
          • com.xatkit.plugins.giphy.platform.action.GetGif
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<RuntimeActionResult>

    public class GetGif
extends RestGetAction<GiphyPlatform>
    A RuntimeAction that retrieves a GIF from a given search string.

    This class relies on the GiphyPlatform to access the Giphy API using the token stored in the Configuration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.xatkit.core.platform.action.RestAction

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetGif

        public GetGif(GiphyPlatform runtimePlatform,
              XatkitSession session,
              String searchString)
        Constructs a new GetGif with the provided runtimePlatform, session, and searchString.

        This constructor requires a valid Giphy API token in order to build the REST query used to retrieve GIF urls.

        Parameters:
        runtimePlatform - the GiphyPlatform containing this action
        session - the XatkitSession associated to this action
        searchString - the String used to search GIFs
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided runtimePlatform, session, or searchString is null
        See Also:
        GiphyPlatform.getGiphyToken()

    • Method Detail

      • handleResponse

        protected Object handleResponse(com.mashape.unirest.http.Headers headers,
                                int status,
                                InputStream body)
        Handles the Giphy API result and returns the retrieved GIF url.
        Specified by:
        handleResponse in class RestAction<GiphyPlatform>
        Parameters:
        headers - the response's Headers
        status - the response status code
        body - the response JsonElement containing the GIF url.
        Returns:
        the retrieve GIF url
